description:
When you face a thorny or complicated estate planning issue, bring it to Babnik Law in Ann Arbor, Michigan. Our law firm's attorneys have years of experience in all kinds of estate planning issues, including the following:

  • Young family estate planning
  • Snowbird estate planning
  • Long-term care provisions
  • End-of-Life arrangements
  • Asset review and structuring
  • Pet trusts

We can also prepare any necessary real estate deeds for you and guide you through probate and estate administration and litigation

In addition, since we hold licenses to practice in Michigan, Florida, New York and New Jersey, our law firm is well-equipped to handle any multistate issues you may have.

We pride ourselves on providing superior legal services to each client. We listen carefully to your estate planning goals and objectives, answer your questions, advise you of your options, and then devise creative solutions personalized to your specific needs. We also pride ourselves on keeping our hourly rates reasonable so as to remain accessible to all who need us, whether individuals or businesses.

Babnik Law offers free initial consultations and virtual appointments. If you prefer, we can arrange to meet with you in the privacy of your home. We also accept all major credit cards for our clients' maximum convenience in paying our highly competitive and eminently reasonable attorneys' fees.
